last_episode_to_air.name: Everything Gonna Be, Okay?!
last_episode_to_air.overview: As she and her friends try to make time for each other no matter what, Issa looks back on all it took to get to where she is today.

name: Insecure
overview: Follows the awkward experiences and racy tribulations of a modern-day African-American woman.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season 2 opens with Issa struggling in the aftermath of her breakup with Lawrence, while facing challenges at a new work assignment. Meanwhile, Molly questions her worth at work, and Lawrence adjusts to his new living arrangement.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In season 3, Issa tries to get her life back together, working as a ride-share driver while crashing on Daniel's couch.

episodes.name: Insecure as F**k
episodes.overview: In the wake of her 29th birthday, Issa Dee reconsiders her dead-end relationship with Lawrence, her live-in boyfriend. Meanwhile, Issa’s best friend, Molly, mourns her singledom and the state of her “lady parts.” Later, Issa uses an open-mic night as an excuse to reconnect with an ex.

episodes.name: Messy as F**k
episodes.overview: After the unexpected events of the previous night, Issa tries to decide what to do about Lawrence, while sticking to her plan to embrace a bolder side of herself. Molly treats herself to a “fancy day” and goes on a promising date. Lawrence gets advice from an unexpected source.

episodes.name: Racist as F**k
episodes.overview: Issa and Lawrence try to move past their issues at home, as she deals with her colleagues’ doubts and he gets a reality check from a head hunter. Molly introduces Jared to her friends, and later struggles to give words of wisdom to a new summer associate at work.

episodes.name: Thirsty as F**k
episodes.overview: Although things are better than ever with Lawrence, Issa turns to Daniel for help during Career Day. Molly finds herself in a tough position when a partner asks her to give Rasheeda a talking-to. Facing disappointment at his new job, Lawrence bonds with a surprising confidante.

episodes.name: Shady as F**k
episodes.overview: Issa is mortified when a video of her profanity-laced rap at an open-mike night goes viral.

episodes.name: Guilty as F**k
episodes.overview: Issa tries to hide her guilt from Lawrence, who reiterates his love for her. Meanwhile, Molly dives into a new romance, but has second thoughts about the future after learning unsavory details about her new boyfriend's past.

episodes.name: Real as F**k
episodes.overview: Issa preps for a fund-raiser, but has trouble staying focused. Meanwhile, Lawrence mulls a job opportunity; and Molly learns something new from an old friend.

episodes.name: Broken as F**k
episodes.overview: The lingering tension between Molly and Issa threatens to resurface during a girls’ trip. Lawrence reconnects with his friends.

episodes.name: Hella Great
episodes.overview: Issa struggles in the aftermath of her breakup with Lawrence, while facing challenges at a new work assignment. Molly questions her worth at work, while Lawrence adjusts to his new living arrangement.

episodes.name: Hella Questions
episodes.overview: Issa tries to make sense of a cryptic encounter. Lawrence considers some crucial decisions. After being on the receiving end of some harsh truths, Molly plots to join the office "boys club." Issa and Frieda encounter a problematic vice principal.

episodes.name: Hella Open
episodes.overview: A sexually frustrated Issa explores a new dating outlook. On a girls' night out, Molly meets a promising new guy. Lawrence's commitment is tested by his new work friends.

episodes.name: Hella LA
episodes.overview: At a day party, Issa has her newfound confidence shaken. Molly has a blast from the past with childhood friend, Dro. A trip to the grocery store turns into a wild and crazy night for Lawrence.

episodes.name: Hella Shook
episodes.overview: Issa attempts to build a roster and butts heads with Frieda at a work retreat. Molly's day takes an unexpected turn at her parents' vow renewal ceremony. Lawrence stumbles upon some news about Issa.

episodes.name: Hella Blows
episodes.overview: Issa maintains her roster but is met with disappointment as she finds herself without a car. Molly worries about an important friendship while embracing something new. Lawrence gets a rude awakening at work after pitching his app.

episodes.name: Hella Disrespectful
episodes.overview: Tensions run high during Derek and Tiffany's dinner party. Molly rethinks her future after being forced to come to terms with her romantic realities. Issa tries to make things right with Frieda.

episodes.name: Hella Perspective
episodes.overview: Issa, Molly and Lawrence face choices affecting their work and personal lives, and consider what the future holds for them.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season 2 opens with Issa struggling in the aftermath of her breakup with Lawrence, while facing challenges at a new work assignment. Meanwhile, Molly questions her worth at work, and Lawrence adjusts to his new living arrangement.

episodes.name: Better-Like
episodes.overview: Issa crashes on Daniel’s couch and tries to save up extra cash. Molly returns from a beach vacation with renewed determination to maintain boundaries in her life.

episodes.name: Familiar-Like
episodes.overview: Issa gets advice from Kelli about her financial situation and plays wingwoman as Daniel tries to make a music-industry connection.

episodes.name: Backwards-Like
episodes.overview: Issa is inspired while recruiting at a job fair with Frieda. Later, she treats Daniel to a thank-you dinner as she remains hopeful about their future. Molly starts her dream job at a black-owned law firm.

episodes.name: Fresh-Like
episodes.overview: Issa tries to let go of some cherished mementos. At work, Frieda tries to help Issa get back in Joanne's good graces. Molly bonds with her new colleagues about an over-confident associate and vents to her therapist about her status at work.

episodes.name: High-Like
episodes.overview: The girls take a weekend trip to celebrate Tiffany. Molly has trouble leaving her obsession with work behind.

episodes.name: Ready-Like
episodes.overview: Issa needs moral support when her new project proves more complicated than she originally thought; Issa and Kelli press Molly to consider dating someone new; the girls attend Tiffany's baby shower and try to be helpful.

episodes.name: Obsessed-Like
episodes.overview: Issa tries to concentrate on her business plan, but is driven to distraction; Molly steps out of her comfort zone in her love life.

episodes.name: Ghost-Like
episodes.overview: After facing numerous obstacles, Issa gets discouraged about her project, while Molly helps give Issa a drama-free 30th birthday.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In season 3, Issa tries to get her life back together, working as a ride-share driver while crashing on Daniel's couch.

episodes.name: Lowkey Feelin' Myself
episodes.overview: Issa and Condola prep for a mixer to promote the block party. Molly has feelings for Andrew.

episodes.name: Lowkey Distant
episodes.overview: When Issa and Condola decide to confront the elephant in the room head-on, Lawrence gets uncomfortable; in search of a real connection, Molly struggles to get Andrew to open up during a date night.

episodes.name: Lowkey Thankful
episodes.overview: While Molly's family celebrates Thanksgiving together, Issa and Ahmal decide to do their own thing. Meanwhile, when Lawrence joins Friendsgiving at Condola's house, the new couple breaks some awkward ground.

episodes.name: Lowkey Losin' It
episodes.overview: The girls get together to help Tiffany with her new baby girl. Later, Issa struggles to finalize key details for the block party and turns to Molly to leverage Andrew's connections.

episodes.name: Lowkey Movin' On
episodes.overview: With the block party finally here, Issa is determined to deliver a memorable event, despite some surprises. Meanwhile, Tiffany enjoys a break from her baby, Kelli entertains a gullible new boo, and Molly attempts to put a grudge on hold.

episodes.name: Lowkey Done
episodes.overview: Feeling deflated after the block party, Issa seeks comfort.

episodes.name: Lowkey Trippin'
episodes.overview: Molly and Andrew embark on the ultimate double-date.

episodes.name: Lowkey Happy
episodes.overview: Issa and Lawrence catch up and talk life, careers, past mistakes, and what makes each of them happy.

episodes.name: Lowkey Trying
episodes.overview: Issa considers doing Nathan a platonic favor. Meanwhile, both Dr. Rhonda and Andrew ask Molly to consider a different approach in dealing with people who've wronged her, and Issa extends a timely olive branch.

episodes.name: Lowkey Lost
episodes.overview: Molly takes Andrew to a work function and they struggle to see eye to eye. Issa continues to search for happiness. The girls get a distressing call about a friend.

episodes.name: Reunited, Okay?!
episodes.overview: Pulling up to her ten-year college reunion in style as an alumni panelist, Issa's self-doubt quickly surfaces, while Molly  still reeling from her breakup  struggles to get out of her own head. As the crew takes the opportunity to reflect, old wounds remain tender.

episodes.name: Growth, Okay?!
episodes.overview: Despite her now thriving business, Issa struggles to find her footing and turns to an old friend for support. Meanwhile, Molly contemplates jumping back into the dating pool.

episodes.name: Pressure, Okay?!
episodes.overview: Still adjusting to newfound responsibilities, one of Issa's exes finds himself torn between two places, while an important woman in his life remains wary of his ability to be fully present back home.

episodes.name: Faulty, Okay?!
episodes.overview: Issa and her new man tread awkward waters at a work-related social event. Meanwhile, Molly juggles multiple suitors, and Issa plays defense against online attacks about her business.

episodes.name: Surviving, Okay?!
episodes.overview: A family emergency finds Molly stretched thin between taking care of loved ones, staying on top of work, and zeroing in on her own perceived shortcomings. As a hectic day unfolds, Issa and her new man grow closer than ever.

episodes.name: Tired, Okay?!
episodes.overview: A distracted Issa mulls over work and love as she stumbles through the consequences of her falling out with a colleague. Meanwhile, Molly - still struggling to cope with family matters - finds comfort in an unlikely source.

episodes.name: Chillin', Okay?!
episodes.overview: A long overdue girls' night filled with self-reflection and real talk puts things into perspective for Issa and her friends.

episodes.name: Choices, Okay?!
episodes.overview: At a crossroads in her career, Issa weighs the pros and cons of two viable paths while simultaneously contemplating an important personal next step. Meanwhile, with help from Kelli, Molly spends an overwhelming day getting her parents' estate plan in order.

episodes.name: Out, Okay?!
episodes.overview: At a friend's going away party, Issa navigates unresolved feelings. After spending the day letting loose with her new man, Molly opens up about her fears.

episodes.name: Everything Gonna Be, Okay?!
episodes.overview: As she and her friends try to make time for each other no matter what, Issa looks back on all it took to get to where she is today.
